"Warum gibt es immer noch Unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen Daten sammeln und verkaufen? Ich finde es skandalös, dass wir als Verbraucher keine Kontrolle über unser eigenes Privatleben haben. #Datenschutz #Privatsphäre #Konsumentenschutz"

Translation: "Why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? I find it outrageous that we as consumers have no control over our own private lives. #DataPrivacy #Privacy #ConsumerProtection"

Explanation: In this post, I'm expressing my frustration with the fact that companies are still able to collect and sell personal data without proper consent or transparency. I believe that consumers should have more control over their private information and that data privacy laws need to be stricter. The hashtags #Datenschutz (data privacy), #Privatsphäre (privacy), and #Konsumentenschutz (consumer protection) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics.
